column2: Objective

Defeat target enemies.

Pursue and defeat target enemies.
Weaken target and then pacify it using <If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),0))>the /soothe emote<Else/><SheetEn(EventItem,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/></If>.
<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),0))>Attack target to reveal its<Else/>Use <SheetEn(EventItem,1,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> to reveal target's</If> true form, then defeat it.
Defeat all targets in the locations specified.
Gather all missing pages of the <Emphasis>Necrologos</Emphasis> and defeat the creature summoned from within.
Use the /beckon emote to lead <SheetEn(BNpcName,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> safely to the specified location.

Gather items at all the specified locations.

Progress
Locations visited

Targets will grow frenzied if pacification is attempted too early.
Levequest deemed a failure if targets accidentally killed.
Defeat <SheetEn(BNpcName,1,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/> to obtain glamour-dispelling <SheetEn(EventItem,1,IntegerParameter(2),2,1)/>.
Levequest deemed a failure if <SheetEn(BNpcName,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> is slain.
Defeat the enemies while protecting your charge.
Defeat as many enemies as possible within the allotted time.
Discover who is carrying <SheetEn(EventItem,2,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/> and slay the target.
Defeat any enemies summoning reinforcements.
Objective failed if insufficient number of enemies slain.
Slay enemies that respond to the <If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),1))>/poke<Else/>/doubt</If> emote and collect <SheetEn(EventItem,1,IntegerParameter(2),2,1)/>.
Objective failed if all <SheetEn(BNpcName,1,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/> are lost.

Use <SheetEn(EventItem,3,IntegerParameter(2),2,1)/> obtained from <SheetEn(BNpcName,3,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/> on <SheetEn(EObj,3,IntegerParameter(3),2,1)/> to lure out <SheetEn(BNpcName,3,IntegerParameter(4),2,1)/>.
